PEARCrater.name: DBSteward
PEARCrater.summary: SQL database XML definition tool for DDL creation and differencing
PEARCrater.description:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
